articles.description: Time is up for the classic bizjet as Bombardier announces the end of Learjet production at its Wichita plant.
articles.content: Its almost the end of the line for one of the most famous names in business aviation, or in aerospace altogether, with the news that manufacturer Bombardier is bringing production of the Learjet to a… [+9721 chars]
